meanings: (물건이) pile up, (가지런히) be stacked (up), (아무렇게나) be heaped (up)
be piled high[thick] one over another

meanings.meaning: a superficial deposit of acidic soils

vlive.korean: 떨려 떨려 - 카드 왜 이리 많이 쌓여! Nervous, nervous. - Why are the cards piling up! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연준 : 게임의 정석

vlive.english: That is stuck deep in side of your body.
